title: Fix critical issues in media tracker

requirements.text: Investigate and resolve any runtime errors, broken functionality, or visual issues currently affecting the media tracker application
acceptanceCriteria: All critical errors are identified and resolved
All user interactions work as expected
Search, sort, and CRUD operations function correctly

requirements.text: Verify that the recently implemented search and sort features are working correctly across all media entries
acceptanceCriteria: Search filters media entries by title in real-time
Sort dropdown correctly orders entries by title A-Z/Z-A, rating high/low, and recently added
UI updates immediately when search or sort options change

constraints: Do not modify the core authentication flow or Internet Identity integration
Preserve existing data structures and backend schema
Maintain the current cinematic burgundy/gold/charcoal theme
nonGoals: Adding new features beyond bug fixes
Adding filtering by genre or rating
